Title: Extract layer extent
Abstract: This algorithm takes a map layer and generates a new vector layer with the minimum bounding box (rectangle polygon with N-S orientation) that covers the input layer. Optionally, the extent can be enlarged to a rounded value.

Accepted data types.str: 'memory:' to store result in temporary memory layer
using vector provider ID prefix and destination URI, e.g. 'postgres:…' to store result in PostGIS table
